#summary Release history

== 0.4 - =
 * Minor maintainability updates [http://code.google.com/p/ruby-pdns/issues/detail?id=13 #13]
 * Unparsable config lines does not prevent the framework from starting [http://code.google.com/p/ruby-pdns/issues/detail?id=16 #16]
 * Records that dont compile or raise exceptions does not cause the framework to die [http://code.google.com/p/ruby-pdns/issues/detail?id=14 #14]
 * New script has been added to facilitate testing of records interactively [http://code.google.com/p/ruby-pdns/issues/detail?id=15 #15]

== 0.3 - 2009/10/03 ==
Initial release
